verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Tangkaruo tawtawrâwt pa- hni siem la, a suta sutin siem rawh; mipuihai ko khâwmna ding le insuoktirna dingin i hmang ding a nih.
Chu chu an mût pha chun mipui po po chu i kuomah intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah an hung inkhâwm vawng ding a nih.
Chun, pakhat chau an mût chun Israel mipuihai hotu ṭhuoituhai chau i kuomah hung khâwm an tih.
Râlkhêl mûta in mût chun sak- tieng panga umhai chu an suok ding a nih.
Chun, râlkhêl mûta a vawihni- naa in mût chun simtieng panga umhai chu an suok ding a nih; an suokna dingin râlkhêl mûtin an mût ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mipuihai hung khâwmna ding ruok chun mût phawt in ta, râlkhêl mût ruok chun mût loin.
Aron naupasal thiempuhai chun tawtawrâwt chu an mût ding a nih. Chu chu in ta dingin in thlahai chenah in kumkhaw dân ding a nih.

In rama hmêlma hnuoisietu cheu do dinga in fe ding phâ râlkhêl mûtin tawtawrâwthai chu in mût ding a nih; chuongchun, LALPA in Pathien hmaa chun hriet zing nîng in tih, chun, in hmêlmahaia inthawk chun sanhim ni bawk in tih.

In hlimna nia dâm, in Fekân ruoiṭhe hunbi neia dâm, in thla thara dâm le, in pumrawhmang thilinhlâna le in inremna thilinhlân inthâwina- haia chun tawtawrâwt chu in mût ding a nih; chuongchun, in Pathien hmaa in ta dinga hriet zingna a ni ding a nih; kei hi LALPA in Pathien ka ni hi,” tiin.
Chun, kum hnina, thla hnina, chu thla ni sâwmhni ni chun sûm chu inhriettirna biekbûk chunga inthawk chun a lo invawr sâng tah a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chu an fe dân bi ang chun Sinai thlalêra inthawk chun an suoka, Chun, Paran thlalêra chun sûm chu a ngîr tah a.
Mosie hmanga LALPA thupêk angin an suok ṭan tah a.
Juda pâwlhai an pâwl tam dân izir peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Amminadab naupa Nason a nih.
Issakar rawi hotu chu Zuar naupa Nethanel a nih.
Zebulun rawi hotu chu Helon naupa Eliab a nih.
Chun, biekbûk chu an ṭhiek a, Gerson naupasalhai le Merari naupa- sal, biekbûk zâwntuhai chu an suok a.
Reuben rawi chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Sedeur naupa Elizur a nih.
Simeon rawi hotu chu Zurisad- dai naupa Selumiel a nih.
Gad rawi hotu chu Deuel naupa Eliasaph a nih.
Chun, Kohath rawi chun thil inthieng chu an zâwn a, an suok a; chun, an va tlung chun biekbûk chu indin zo hieu a lo ni tah a.
Ephraimhai chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Ammihud naupa Elisama a nih;
Manassehai hotu chu Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel a nih;
Benjaminhai hotu chu Gideoni naupa Abidan a nih.
Chun, a nuhnungtaka chun Dan hai chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a, an hotu chu Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer a nih.
Aserhai hotu chu Okran naupa Pagiel a nih.
Naphtalihai hotu chu Enan naupa Ahira a nih.
Chuong ang chu a nih Israel thlahai an pâwl tam dân ang peia an fe dân chu; chuong ang tak chun an suok tah a.

Chun, Mosie tarpupa Midian mi Reuel naupa Hobab kuomah Mosie chun, “Pêng ka ti cheu, LALPAIN a tina hmuna chun ei fe ding a nih; keini lai hung ve la ṭhatakin i chungah thâwng kan ta, LALPA chun Israel thlahai chungchâng thu chu ṭhatakin a hril ta sih a,” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Hung da el ka tih, keini ramah ka laibunghai kuomah fe lem ka tih,” a ta.
Mosie chun, “Mi fesan lul naw raw khai, thlalêra umhmun kan khuorna ding chu i hriet lem sih a, kan ta dingin mit i hung ni ding a nih.
Keini leh i fe ve chun, LALPAIN thil ṭha a mi thawpêk ang peiin thawpêk vêng kan ti che,” a ta.
Chuongchun, LALPA tlânga inthawka ni thum lamah an feh a; LALPA Thuthlungna bâwm chu an ta dinga innghatna hmun remchâng zawngin chu ni thum lama chun a fe hmasa pei a.
An bûka inthawka an suok chun LALPA sûm an hmaa chu sûna chun an chungah a um pei a.
Chun, bâwm chu a suok ding po leh Mosien, “Aw LALPA, hung inthawk la, i hmêlmahai chu sukdar la, a theidatu che chu i hmaah tlânse raw se,” a ti hlak a.
Chun, ân nghat po leh, “Aw LALPA, Israel mipuihai lai hin hung kîr nâwk rawh,” a ti hlak a.
